_header: Young men I warn you everyone
_description: Verses against marrying elderly women — five quatrains with refrain, ‘I dar not seyȝ quan che seȝt pes’ and burden: ‘How hey it is not les / I dar not seyȝ quan che seȝt pes’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Yyng men I warne you euerychonElde wywys tak ye
                    non…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Þou art not worght half a peseI dar not seyȝ quan
                    che seȝt pes
